ARABIC: وَإِذَا يُتْلَىٰ عَلَيْهِمْ قَالُوٓا۟ ءَامَنَّا بِهِۦٓ إِنَّهُ ٱلْحَقُّ مِن رَّبِّنَآ إِنَّا كُنَّا مِن قَبْلِهِۦ مُسْلِمِينَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: When it is recited to them they say, 'We have iman in it; it is the truth from our Lord. We were already
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: And when it is read out to them, say: "We believe in it. It's the truth from our Lord. We had committed ourselves before it came."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: When it is recited to them they say: "We believe in it for it is the Truth from our Lord. Indeed we were already Muslims."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: When it is recited to them, they say, "We believe in it. It is the Truth from our Lord. We were Muslims before it was revealed".
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And when these verses are recited to them, they say, “We accept faith in it – indeed it is the Truth from our Lord – and indeed we had surrendered even before this.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And when it is recited to them, they say: "We believe in it. Verily, it is the truth from our Lord. Indeed even before it we have been from Muslims."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And when it is recited to them they say: We believe in it surely it is the truth from our Lord; surely we were submitters before this.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: and, when it is recited to them, they say, 'We believe in it; surely it is the truth from our Lord. Indeed, even before' it we had surrendered.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And when it is recited unto them, they say: We believe in it. Lo! it is the Truth from our Lord. Lo! even before it we were of those who surrender (unto Him).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: and, when it is recited to them, they say, "We believe in it. Indeed it is the truth from our Lord. Even before it came, we had submitted ourselves."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And when it is rehearsed unto them they say: we believe therein: verily it is truth from our Lord: verily we have been even before it of those who submit themselves.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: and when it is recited to them, they say, ‘We believe in it. It is indeed the truth from our Lord. Indeed we were Muslims [even] before it [came].’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And when it is recited to them, they say: "We believe therein, for it is the Truth from our Lord: indeed we have been Muslims (bowing to Allah's Will) from before this.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And when it is recited to them, they say: "We believe in it. Verily, it is the truth from our Lord. Indeed even before it we have been from those who submit themselves to Allah in Islam as Muslims (like 'Abdullah bin Salam and Salman Al-Farisi, etc.).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: When it is recited to them, they say: 'We believe in it, because it is the truth from Our Lord. We surrendered ourselves before it came.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: When it is recited to them, they say, “We have believed in it; it is the truth from our Lord; we were Muslims prior to it.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And when it is recited to them, they say, "We have believed in it; indeed, it is the truth from our Lord. Indeed we were, [even] before it, Muslims [submitting to Allah]."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [28:53] And, when it is recited to them, the Qur’ān, they say, ‘We believe in it. It is indeed the Truth from our Lord. Lo! [even] before it we had submitted’, we affirmed God’s Oneness.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And when it is recited unto them) and when the Qur'an is recited to them expositing the attributes and description of Muhammad (pbuh) (they say: We believe in it) we believe in Muhammad (pbuh) and in the Qur'an. (Lo! it is the Truth from our Lord. Lo! even before it) before the recitation of the Qur'an to us (we were of those who surrender (unto Him)) we were of those who believe in Muhammad (pbuh) and the Qur'an.
